titles.title: Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” / Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” / Mäṣḥafä ṭomar “Book of the Letter (from Heaven)”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary" (fols. 4ra-94rb) I-1) Excerpt from the Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fol. 4ra-va) I-2) ʾAkkonu bǝʾǝsi... “Does not the man...” (fols. 4va-8ra) I-3) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fol. 9ra-12va) I-4) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 12vb-15rb) I-5) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki ... “I worship Thee ...” (fols. 15va-16rb) I-6) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary”: 60 miracles (fols. 16rb-94ra) I-7) Sälam läki ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq... “Salutation to you, Threshold of the East…” (fol. 94ra-rb) II) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” (fols. 95ra-125rb) II-1) Story of the family of Adam (fols. 95ra-99vb) II-2) Täʾamrä ʾIyasus “Miracles of Jesus”: 18 miracles (fols. 99vb-125rb) III) Mäṣḥafä ṭomar “Book of the Letter (from Heaven)” (fols. 126ra-133va)
Additiones 1-4.

copyists.copyist: Lǝʿulä Qal (hand b) is mentioned as the scribe in the concluding supplication of Text I-6 on fol. 93vb.

donors.donor: According to Additio 3, the Ms. was commissioned by community of ʾAbrǝqo during the tenure of qes gäbäz Tewodros and, after him, qäsis Täsfa Ṣǝyon. Both names are written in supplication formulas (fols. 12vb, 16rb, 20vb etc), in hand b. In addition, many other names are mentioned like Zä-ʾIyäsus (fols. 23vb, 25vb, 28ra etc.) and ʾAmdä Mikaʾel (fols. 26rb, 30vb, 37ra etc.); interlineally in a secondary hand: Fǝśśǝḥa Giyorgis and Täklä Giyorgis (fols. 12vb, 18rb, 32rb, 44ra etc.). The nameof Tewodros Wäldä Giyorgis is written, not rubricated, in the supplication on fol. 4va, in hand a.

txstates.txstate: Fols. 9r-16r with the Texts I-3 and I-4 show traces of extensive use. The leather cover on both boards is partly torn off at the upper edges. The Ms. was resewn and an overback added (partly detached from the spine). Quire I, of different size and colour; has been added at a later stage. Holes or tears amended on fols. 26, 41, 45, 78, 110, 112.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dark brown tooled leather. Overback made of reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the dark brown leather cover is poorly visible (at least 6 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, small x, corni-from, double sine wave with dots, double crescent). Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown overback (1 tool was used: single line fillet).

bnothers.bnother: Remains and traces (holes) of two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

inks.ink: Black, red (hand a: brilliant red, hand b: vivid red).

squires.squire: A(2; s.l.: 1, stub after 1; 2, stub before 2/fols. 1r-2v) – <I(6/fols. 3r-8v)> – II፩(10/fols. 9r-18v) – ፪III(10/fol. 19r-28v) – ፫IV፫(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 29r-38v) – ፬V፬(10/fols. 39r-48v) – ፭VI(10/fols. 49r-58v) – ፮VII፮(10/fols. 59r-68v) – ፯VIII፯(8/fols. 69r-76v) – ፰IX፯(8/fols. 77r-84v) – ፱X፱(10/fols. 85r-94v) – ፲XI፲(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 95-104v) – ፲፩XII፲፩(9; s.l.: 7, stub after 2/fols. 105r-113v) – ፲፪XIII፲፪(10/fol. 114r-123v) – ፲፫XIV፲፫(10/fols. 124r-133v) – B(2; s.l.: 1, stub after 1; 2, stub before 2/fols. 134r-135v)

taunit.mr-info: Quire I: all data for fol. 5r.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/A. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Quires II-XIV: all data for fol. 10r.
taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Some fols. have one or two additional ruled lines at the bottom (fols. 21rv, 26rv, 78r).

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: careful. Hand b: mediocre.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 4ra-8ra (quire I); conspicuously right-sloping letters with long vowel markers. Hand b, Lǝʿulä Qal: fols. 9ra-133va (quires II-XIV); broad, roundly shaped letters, thick vertical lines.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; names of the commissioners; the word sälam "salutation" in Texts I-3 and I-5, abbreviated directives for the ministers in Text I-3, the word sänbät “Sabbath” in Text III; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Two lines of the incipit of Text I-1, alternating with black lines; the first word or its abbreviated form of each strophe of Text I-2; several groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-3, II and III, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of the incipit of Texts I-4, I-5 and I-6; one or two initial lines of sections of Texts I-3, I-4; two initial lines of the sections of Texts I-6, II and III.

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-2 comprises 31 strophes which are strophes 1-5, 7-31, 33 according to GrohHymn pp. 336-53.
Text I-3, partly with interlineal musical notation, contains: - Ṣälotä [zä-yǝbǝl] ʾǝmqǝdmä [yanbǝbu] täʾamǝr ... “Prayer [recited] before [reading] the Miracles ..." (fols. 12va)
Text I-4 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam wäladitä ʾamlak ... “O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Godbearing ...” (fols. 14rb l.3-rb l.18) - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..." (fol. 14rb-va) (cp. ChRep no. 373) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ..." (fols. 14va-15rb).
The miracles of Mary (Text I-6) are numbered. Text I-7 is followed by a short note which determines when the short hymn has to be read.
The miracles of Jesus (Text II-2) are numbered. The scribe numbered the introduction as miracles 1 and 2. Text II is followed by a short hymn: ʾƎgziʾa sänbät wäld …, the incipit reads as follows, fol. 125rb: እግዚአ፡ ሰንበት፡ ወልድ፡ ሶበ፡ አርአየ፡ ነቢረ፡ ተአምር፡ በሰንበት፡ …

additional.cont: Fol. 8rb: Note concerning the local maḥbär-association (?)
Fols. 125va: Excerpts  from Säˁatat zä-lelit “Horologium for the Night” (MSLN p. 116).
additional.det: Both excerpts are written in red, in the same secondary hand.

additional.cont: Fols. 125va-vb: Täˀamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus "Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus": 1 miracle.
additional.det: Two initial lines and the name of the protagonist are rubricated.

additional.cont: Fols. 134ra-rb: Note on commissioning the writing.
additional.det: The note is written in the main hand. It states that the Ms. was commissioned by the community of ʾAbrǝqo during the tenure of qes gäbäz Tewodros and, after him, qäsis Täsfa Ṣǝyon. The note is followed by an exhortation to read this Ms. on the feast days of God, on Sunday and on the feast days of St. Mary.

extras.extra: - Lists of the members of the local maḥbär-association (?), in ink, pen and pencil: fols. 1r-2r. - Immediate correction is indicated by thin lines above and below the words to be cancelled on fol. 7ra. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 11ra, 15va, 17vb, 19rb, 22vb, 27rb, 33vb, 43rab, 45va, 58rb, 68vb, 81va, 95rb, 102vb, 124va, 126rb. - Thin black and/or red lines for line filling: e.g., fols. 15ra, 21ra, 22ra, 88vb. - Dittographical errors are marked with red or black lines around the words: fols. 45rb, 50va, 52va, 104rb.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Decorated quire marks (rubrication has not been executed) are often written twice (partly faded), in the inner upper corner of the first and last folio of the quires on fols. 18v: ፩, 19r: ፪, 29r/38v: ፫, 39r/48v: ፬, 49r: ፭, 59r/68v: ፮, 69r/76v: ፯, 77r/84v: ፰, 85r/94v: ፱, 95r/104v: ፲, 105r/113v: ፲፩, 114r/123v: ፲፪, 124r/133v: ፲፫.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the feasts and other occasions written in the upper margin, in the main hand: ምንባብ፡ ዘእኁድ፡ ሰንበት: fol. 85vb አመ፡ ፳ወ፫፡ለነሐሴ: fol. 88vb. ምንባብ፡ በበዓለ፡ ሚካኤል: fol. 92va.
